p: Other reported sources of RA are calli and cell suspensions of A. rugosa and E. sericeum. After 10 days of culture, cell suspensions of A. rugosa reached the maximum growth and RA production when cultured in B5 liquid medium together with 2 mg L −1 2,4-D and 0.1 mg L −1 of benzylaminopurine (BAP) [ 145]. E. sericeum root lines derived spontaneously from calli produced up to 4.50% DW of RA, whereas the original callus line achieved only 2.04% [ 146].
